description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nBlood Barrier:
After your creatures are healed by their {CONDNAME_BUFF_LEECH} buff, they gain a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} that absorbs damage equal to 50% of the amount recovered. This trait does not stack.
name: Oozing Cyst
